means: 多声部音乐中的上方声部

sentence.Network_en: An elderly woman, arms crossed, sang the descant.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位双臂交叉的老妇人演唱了高音部。

sentence.Network_en: You need not descant upon my shortcomings.
She is catching cold today, so she can't descant on the tune.
sentence.Network_cn: 她今天感冒了, 不能唱高声卸.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... essence（ 本质，要素，精华）； descant（ 详论，细说）； despicable（ 可鄙的…
字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... derive 起源,获得 descant 详述 describe 形容,描写,叙述.
2012年新GRE考试新增词汇（1）_新东方网 ... deracinate v. 根除, 灭绝 descant n. 合唱，详述 devout a. 虔诚的, 诚恳的.

list.abs: keep tabs on记录, 监视, 看守descant on 评论devolve on移交

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French deschant, from medieval Latin discantus 'part-song, refrain'

entry.def: A descant is a tune which is played or sung above the main tune in a piece of music.

example.ex: An elderly woman, arms crossed, sang the descant.
example.tran: 一位双臂交叉的老妇人演唱了高音部。

means.word_mean: 1. a decorative musical accompaniment (often improvised) added above a basic melody
2. sing by changing register; sing by yodeling;

sentences.sentence: "The Austrians were yodeling in the mountains"

means.word_mean: 3. talk at great length about something of one's interest

auth_sentence.content: Her high voice sounded in a thin piping descant above the rest.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her high voice sounded in a thin piping descant above the rest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her high voice sounded in a thin piping descant above the rest.

auth_sentence.content: To spy my shadow in the sun And descant on mine own deformity.
auth_sentence.res_content: To spy my shadow in the sun And descant on mine own deformity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To spy my shadow in the sun And descant on mine own deformity.

cant唱,歌+o音乐术语→唱的诗歌
